strictDN.description: Force strict DN parsing for client methods @default true

tlsOptions.description: Additional options passed to TLS connection layer when connecting via ldaps://
tlsOptions.title: TLSOptions

clientCertEngine.description: Name of an OpenSSL engine which can provide the client certificate. @default null

enableTrace.description: When enabled, TLS packet trace information is written to stderr. This can be used to debug TLS connection problems. @default false

rejectUnauthorized.description: If true the server will reject any connection which is not authorized with the list of supplied CAs. This option only has an effect if requestCert is true. @default false

requestCert.description: If true the server will request a certificate from clients that connect and attempt to verify that certificate. @default false

adminGroup.description: CN of the directory's administrators group. @default Domain Admins

hide.description: The list of group distinguishedNames, sAMAccountNames, or cn that should not be shown in the /groups view dropdowns and search. Accessing directly to /groups/[dn] of a group that is listed here will result on a '403 This group is hidden by configuration' error. @default []

limit.description: The maximum amount of groups allowed in the directory. If set to null the limit will be ignored. Default groups are included in the count. @default null

hide.description: The list of ou distinguishedNames, sAMAccountNames, or cn that should not be shown in the /ous view dropdowns and search. Accessing directly to /ous/[dn] of a ou that is listed here will result on a '403 This ou is hidden by configuration' error. @default []

allowNonLeafDelete.description: [Dangerous] Allows the deletion of non-leaf Organizational Units. This will recursively delete all entries in the Organizational Unit. @default false

limit.description: The maximum amount of ous allowed in the directory. If set to null the limit will be ignored. Default ous are included in the count. @default null

hide.description: The list of entry distinguishedNames, sAMAccountNames, or cn that should not be shown in the /tree view panels and search. Accessing directly to /tree/[dn] of an entry that is listed here will result on a '403 This resource is hidden by configuration' error. Hiding containers or ous will also throw the error if trying to access any of the children directly. All hidden entries from users, groups, and ous will also be hidden in the tree view. Hiding the root entry will hide the whole tree, throwing the error always. @default []

The list of user distinguishedNames, sAMAccountNames, or cn that should not be shown in the /users view dropdowns and search. Accessing directly to /users/[dn] of a user that is listed here will result on a '403 This user is hidden by configuration' error, however, signing in as a listed user will not result in error. @default []

limit.description: The maximum amount of users allowed in the directory. If set to null the limit will be ignored. Default users are included in the count. @default null

size.description: Length of the captcha shown in the authentication page, recommended to use a low value for development. @default 5

fontSize.description: Font size of the characters in the captcha. @default 30

charPreset.description: Characters used to generate the random string in the captcha. @default "0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"

color.description: If false, captcha will be black and white otherwise, it will be randomly colorized @default false

ignoreChars.description: Characters that will be ignored in the captcha. @default ""

noise.description: Number of noise lines in the captcha. @default 5

background.description: CSS color of the captcha background. Can use other css variants other than hex. @default "#FFFFFF"

allowSelfEdit.description: Allow non-admin users to edit their own profiles and change their passwords. In the server this is done using the administrator credentials since in a directory only administrators have edit access (administrator@{PUBLIC_LDAP_DOMAIN}, ADMIN_PASSWD, PUBLIC_LDAP_DOMAIN and ADMIN_PASSWD are .env variables). @default false

allowAccessToUsersPage.description: Allow non-admin users to access the "/users" and "/users/[dn]" pages. @default false

allowAccessToGroupsPage.description: Allow non-admin users to access the "/groups" and "/groups/[dn]" pages. @default false

allowAccessToOUsPage.description: Allow non-admin users to access the "/ous" and "/ous/[dn]" pages. @default false

allowAccessToTreePage.description: Allow non-admin users to access the "/tree" page. @default false

allowAccessToLogsPage.description: Allow non-admin users to access the "/logs" page. @default false

basePath.description: Logging paths. Where the app and system logs will be stored. @default "./logs/"

decodeSearchParams.$comment: Converts %20 to whitespace, and so on using decodeUriComponent in the search parameters
decodeSearchParams.description: Enable or disable url search params decoding. @default false

decodePathname.$comment: Converts %20 to whitespace, and so on using decodeUriComponent in the pathname
decodePathname.description: Enable or disable pathname decoding. @default false

logDateTemplate.description: Log date template as indicated by @link https://day.js.org/docs/en/display/format @default "YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss A"

useLogging.description: Enable or disable logging. If `false` `basePath` is ignored. If `true` `basePath` is required @default false
